summary:
Hey guys! This is the first mod I have ever made. Ever.

All this mod does is increase the Hunting Bow’s damage to 26 (from 7) and increase the attack speed to 1.2 (from 0.937). The reason being is, I really like the look of the hunting bow, but it doesn’t do enough damage for me to have fun with it.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys! This is the first mod I have ever made. Ever.

All this mod does is increase the Hunting Bow’s damage to 26 (from 7) and increase the attack speed to 1.2 (from 0.937). The reason being is, I really like the look of the hunting bow, but it doesn’t do enough damage for me to have fun with it.

The improved bow's name is Hunter's bow. It can be bought in the Drunken Huntsman.

This mod should be compatible with all mods, except the ones that mess with the hunting bow.

Possible glitch: Sometimes the Hunter's bow won't show the correct item necessary to temper it in the tempering menu. To fix it just leave the grindstone, then come back.

Like I said, this is my first mod and I would really appreciate suggestions, critiques, etc. Also if it doesn’t work with a mod, please let me know.
Please remember though, I'm just starting out and you may know more about modding than I do. If that is the case, please help me out.

Also in the steam workshop at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=248081344

All screenshots taken by me.

Hunting Bow with purple background picture taken from http://www.therpf.com/f9/skyrim-hunting-bow-done-next-up-ebony-186433/
author: hmjki
